On today's adventure, Dan tells Jordan all about a report [[Alex Jones]] posted purporting to explain the Secret of 2017. Topics covered include:

*Does Phish have one good song?
*Would Alex Jones be fun to hang out with late night at a dive bar?
*Can an external observer read the mind of [[Megyn Kelly]]?
*The declining quality in the food at Luby's Diner
